name: Guren Blade

weaponEffects.title: Physical Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase physical ATK by **15%** and physical resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more physical-damage weapons. This set also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. This effect does not stack repeatedly.

advancements: After hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, grant 1 stack of the following buff: Increase damage dealt by **8%** for **25** seconds, stacking up to **3** times for a maximum of 1 stack per skill use.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

When hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, apply 1 stack of War Wounds to the target: Increase incoming physical damage and shatter from physical weapons by **10%** for **15** seconds. Stack up to **1** time.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
Hitting targets with skills or discharge skills grants Skill Damage Boost, which increases all weapon skill damage by **20%** for **25** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.
Skills hitting the same target no longer have reduced damage. After using Guren Blade's skills or discharge skill, all targets with War Wounds within 8 meters gain another **1** stack of War Wounds.

abilities.name: Quick Slash
abilities.description: While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.

abilities.name: Jumping Strike
abilities.description: While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone. Upon hit, suspend the target. Cyclone can deal **47.8%** of ATK + **3** to a single target.

abilities.name: Diving Edge
abilities.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge. While falling, deal damage equal to **10%** of ATK + **1** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **76.4%** of ATK + **4** and knock the target back.

The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** of ATK.

abilities.name: Soundtrack
abilities.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **570%** of ATK + **30**.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for **0.5** seconds.

abilities.name: Leap Attack
abilities.description:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Leap Attack.

The Wanderer swings their blade and deals damage equal to **37.9%** of ATK + **2**, **strongly suspending** them while going airborne. Then, deal additional damage equal to **56.8%** of ATK + **3**.

abilities.name: Roam
abilities.description: Dance through targets while swinging the blade, dealing damage equal to **418%** of ATK + **22** to up to **5** targets (consecutive hits on the same target deal **20%** less damage). At Roam has concluded, slash the space in front, dealing damage equal to **264%** of ATK + **14** to surrounding targets and suspend them. Immune to control effects while skill is in use, and all damage taken is reduced by **50%**. Cooldown: **15** seconds.

abilities.name: Unbridled Flurry
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge*** is full or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon **removes all debuffs from the Wanderer**, who then rushes to and **strongly suspends** a target, dealing **523.3%** of ATK + **28** damage, leaving behind a Bladestorm that deals **209.6%** of ATK + **11** damage, while gaining immunity to to grievous/freeze/burn/electrify effects for **5** seconds.

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Good option for boosting damage and shatter (Guren Blade does a fair amount of shatter with the skill and discharge).

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: Good option for boosting damage when at high crit rate.

recommendedMatrices.name: Claudia
recommendedMatrices.description: Somewhat decent option that increases damage of other weapons and increases aerial attack damage.

recommendedMatrices.name: Pepper
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR matrices, and will help you build charge more quickly. If you use this weapon as a main DPS, use Sobek 3-piece instead.
